settings.callout_content:
We offer free domestic returns and exchanges within 30 days from the original order date*, as long as the item is in original condition (unwashed/unworn), with the tags still attached, in original packaging, and is not part of specific special promotions.

Exchanges valid only for other prints available at the time of original purchase. Optional paid priority is not refunded.

Some products may be excluded from receiving free returns, you can learn read our full policy to learn more.
settings.print_also_available_text: This print is also available as:
settings.scarce_description: We’re restocking prints as fast as we can but it still takes 3-6 months to restock a print once it is sold out. If you have your eye on a print grab it while you can!
settings.why-title: Why Doctors Recommend Bamboo Over Cotton:
settings.first-drop-content:
• 95% Viscose from Bamboo, 5% Spandex
  • Two-Way Cross-Body Front Zipper, Footless Romper
  • Short Sleeves
  • True To Size To Comply With CPSC Regulation
  • Our Bamboo Is Not Chemically Treated
settings.second-drop-content:
• FREE US Shipping on all orders $50+
  • FREE 3 Day Shipping on Orders $100+
  • Easy Returns Within 30 Days Of Purchase
  • Express International Shipping (2-5 Business Days Starting At $14.99)
settings.third-drop-content:
Care instructions
  • Gentle Wash Cold, Inside Out, With Like Colors (Make Sure All Buttons & Snaps Are Closed
  • Tumble Dry Low
Pro Tips:
  • Lay Flat To Dry For Optimal Results
  • Place In Garment Bag For Extra Protection
  • Use A Color Catcher To Further Prevent Color Bleeding
